about_the_game:
"After the Long Night" is a sandbox survival and building game themed around a post-apocalyptic world. In this game, players find themselves in a city overrun by zombies and must establish a base in the ruins, recruit survivors, and defend against relentless zombie hordes. Players must not only protect their base from attacks but also preserve the last hope for humanity.

Game Features:

  • Highly Realistic and Detailed Environments: Every district and battlefield in the game is carefully designed to recreate a post-apocalyptic world. The ruins, desolate streets, destroyed buildings, and decaying urban landscapes provide an immersive gaming experience.

  • Free Construction and Resource Utilization: Players can freely use the resources and assets found in the environment to build and reinforce their base. Building materials, abandoned equipment, and everything in the city can become key to survival.

  • Crafting and Weapon Upgrades: In this world, weapons and equipment are essential. Players can use the resources around them to craft and upgrade gear, enhancing their combat abilities to face the ever-increasing zombie threat.

  • Created by an Independent Studio: Developed by an indie studio full of passion and creativity, the game aims to offer players a unique experience. Every detail has been meticulously designed to provide a more realistic and challenging post-apocalyptic survival journey.

short_description: Long Dark Night is a sandbox survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Players build bases, gather resources, craft weapons, and face constant threats from both zombies. The game features free construction and strategic defense, where only the strongest will survive.
